existing_features.title: Remove the six selected images from the Gallery grid by deleting their corresponding entries from the gallery data source so the images no longer render and the grid reflows with no empty slots. The images to remove correspond to the elements at XPaths: (1) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[7]/img[1], (2) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[8]/img[1], (3) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[17]/img[1], (4) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[21]/img[1], (5) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[27]/img[1], (6) /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[28]/img[1]. In the current code, these correspond to removing these `src` entries from `frontend/src/data/galleryImages.ts`: `generated/gallery-work-07.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-work-08.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-17.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-21.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-27.dim_1200x1600.jpg`, `generated/gallery-real-28.dim_1200x1600.jpg`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Delete the specified pictures and remove their corresponding slots from the gallery/section
